member.name: USERCLASSTYPE
member.summary: Indicates the different variants of the display name associated with a class of objects.

member.name: USERCLASSTYPE.USERCLASSTYPE_FULL
member.summary: The full type name of the class.

member.name: USERCLASSTYPE.USERCLASSTYPE_SHORT
member.summary: A short name (maximum of 15 characters) that is used for popup menus and the Links dialog box.

member.name: USERCLASSTYPE.USERCLASSTYPE_APPNAME
member.summary: The name of the application servicing the class and is used in the result text in dialog boxes.
